sentences.en: A : What benefits do the Peony Card have for corporate cardholder?
sentences.cn: 领用牡丹卡对单位有什么好处呢?

sentences.en: A peony is a showy flower.
Her mobile peony mouth and large innocent eyes added eloquence to colour and shape.
sentences.cn: 她那两片娇艳生动的红嘴唇儿,一双天真纯洁的大眼睛,使她在容貌颜色上,平添了一段动人之处.

sentences.en: Here is your Peony Card with the check slip.
sentences.cn: 这是您的牡丹卡及其回条.

sentences.en: I was attracted by the porcelain doll of Peony Pavilion.
sentences.cn: 一组《牡丹亭》的瓷偶,非常春宫,但也并未褪尽衣衫.

sentences.en: Includes : crushed peony, sueded musk, sheer tuberose , woven cassis, and crepe gardenia.
sentences.cn: 牡丹, 麝香, 晚香玉, 黑醋栗, 栀子花.

sentences.en: Peony 25 international system, full functional color television. New face, new feeling.
sentences.cn: 牡丹25英寸世界制式全功能彩色电视机. 新面目, 新感觉.

sentences.en: Peony casts the other flowers into the shade.
Peony is a kind of herbs.
Peony is one of my favourite flowers.
sentences.cn: 牡丹是我最喜欢的花之一.

sentences.en: Peony is our national flower, symbols of wealth and prosperity.
sentences.cn: 牡丹是我们的国花, 是财富和欣欣向荣的象征.

sentences.en: Suddenly he heard a rustle in the peony pavilion and someone sighing deeply.
sentences.cn: 他忽闻有人在牡丹亭畔长吁短叹.

sentences.en: The flowers in the peony exhibition are so gorgeous and lovable.
sentences.cn: 牡丹花展,株株绚丽多姿,惹人喜欢.

sentences.en: The large, rich peony flowers look great in gardens and this is exactly why they are often seen as part of outdoors arrangements.
sentences.cn: 花园里花朵大大的、富丽堂皇的牡丹花看上去美极了，这就是为什么我们总能在户外布景看到它们。

sentences.en: The Peony Pavilion holds extreme significance in the repertoire of Kun Opera.
sentences.cn: 牡丹亭》为昆剧中最重要之经典剧目,女主角杜丽娘追求[情至性]精神,始终是古今中外各种版本《牡丹亭》演出中所极欲歌颂的核心.

sentences.en: Tree Peony mainly used as a nerve tonic for insomnia and depression.
sentences.cn: 牡丹被用于调理神经,改善失眠及抑郁.

trans.tran_en: a garden plant with large round flowers that are dark red, white, or pink
